titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 88) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to marriage.
Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 88) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to marriage.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-573, by Mr. Gingrey.

During consideration of H.J. Res. 88 pursuant to this resolution, notwithstanding the operation of the previous question, the Chair may postpone further consideration of the joint resolution to a time designated by the Speaker.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 213.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 918.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.J.Res. 88 (Marriage Protection Amendment).
